item.title: EP 260 - Who Lives, Who Dies, Who Takes Your Cattle?
item.itunes:title: Who Lives, Who Dies, Who Takes Your Cattle?
item.description:
Today we try to catch a bus that will solve all our problems, and then investigate the first recorded cattle mutilation in America!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Philly Urban Legends: The Wandering Bus

https://nmirra.wordpress.com/2011/02/18/philly-urban-legends-the-wandering-bus/

 

The Pennsylvania Urban Legend That Will Make Your Skin Crawl

https://www.onlyinyourstate.com/pennsylvania/bus-to-nowhere-pa/

 

Encyclopaedia Of The Impossible: The Wandering Bus Of Philadelphia

https://theghostinmymachine.com/2019/01/02/encyclopaedia-of-the-impossible-the-wandering-bus-to-nowhere-philadelphia-zero-urban-legend/

 

WARNING: Drug users ingesting wasp spray for cheap 'meth-like' high

https://www.wsbtv.com/news/local/cherokee-county/drug-users-are-ingesting-wasp-spray-to-get-a-cheap-meth-like-high/968262586

 

Did an 1890s Hoax Foreshadow Livestock Mutilations of the Coming Decades?

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2016/08/did-an-1890s-hoax-foreshadow-livestock-mutilations-of-the-coming-decades/

 

Cattle Mutilation

https://skeptoid.com/episodes/4456

 

Alexander Hamilton and the 1897 UFO/Cattle Mutilation Incident

http://www.ufonut.com/alexander-hamilton-and-the-1800s-cattle-mutilation-incident/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
